name: Orrery of the Hollow Star
shortDescription: The Orrery are a fractured order of astro-mathematic seers driven mad by misalignment. They see battle as celestial correction â€” an opportunity to restore divine geometry through synchronized violence. Their rituals are equations. Their weapons are gravitational errors. And their minds orbit far from mercy.
description: The Orrery of the Hollow Star are cosmic scholars who study the patterns of the void. Their warriors wear armor inscribed with star-maps and wield weapons that can bend space and time to their will.

units.name: Star Seeker
units.description: Basic unit trained in celestial navigation and void combat.

units.name: Cosmic Weaver
units.description: Elite unit that can manipulate space and time.

units.name: Void Knight
units.description: Heavy infantry unit wearing armor that can phase through reality.

equipment.name: Star Blade
equipment.description: A weapon that can cut through space and time.

equipment.name: Celestial Armor
equipment.description: Armor inscribed with star-maps that can predict enemy movements.

equipment.name: Void Compass
equipment.description: A device that can navigate through folded space.

branches.name: Order of the Celestial Blade
branches.description: Specializes in void combat and space manipulation.

branches.name: Void Weavers
branches.description: Masters of space-time manipulation and void magic.
